title: Debuff immunity item
body: Working out the timing, CD, and how many people are affected by it, it would be cool to see an item that grants temporary immunity to any armor/mr shred (even true damage) considering the issues with lethality and tanks getting blown up quite frequently or at least build around that concept.

replies.body:
That would be cool but do you think bruisers could exploit it and create an off tank dive meta where all mages and marksmen get dives by Simi tanks?
It sounds like a great solution to the tanks late game scaling issue
possibly I guess its just a matter of how riot would want to balance the item to where it doesn't get exploited in that regard, not sure how'd you go about that though
